Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoulderDashController, IOrderPerformer
public final class Controller extends Object implements IBoulderDashController, IOrderPerformer
this class manage the controller's use.it manages the model and the view , it implements the IBoulderDashController and IOrderPerformer
